summary: Just another retexture of skyrims moons [Masser and Secunda]
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]DESCRIPTION[/size]
Here is my take on the moons of tamriel
2x the resolution of the vanilla textures

In my opinion the new textures look much more realistic. I have split the two retextures into separate files just in case you prefer one of the vanilla moons over mine.

Unfortunately the textures look a little different in game. Every monitor has differing color settings and its impossible to account for all monitors.
[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/40785-1-1377146774.jpg[/img]

The retexture for secunda(smaller moon) is slightly higher quality than masser(larger). Which is funny because its the smaller of the two. Secundas texture map had a higher resolution when I rendered the two moons.

[b][i][size=4]Once again the colors of these textures will look different depending on other installed mods (ENBs and lighting mods)[/size][/i][/b]



[size=5]FILES[/size]
There are six options at the moment:
[b][size=3]-----Both moons combined[/size][/b]
LV Moons
Low saturation LV Moons

[b][size=3]-----Just the red moon[/size][/b]
LV Masser
Low saturation LV Masser

[b][size=3]-----Just the grey moon[/size][/b]
LV Secunda
Low saturation LV Secunda



[size=5]INSTALLATION[/size]
just simply unzip the [textures folder] and drop the entire folder into your data folder ---> C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData

[size=5]UNINSTALLATION[/size]
remove the following files from C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimDatatexturessky :
masser_full.dds
masser_three_wan.dds
masser_three_wax.dds
masser_half_wan.dds
masser_half_wax.dds
masser_one_wan.dds
masser_one_wax.dds
secunda_full.dds
secunda_three_wan.dds
secunda_three_wax.dds
secunda_half_wan.dds
secunda_half_wax.dds
secunda_one_wan.dds
secunda_one_wax.dds

[size=3]***Please upload your own pictures! I need User photos :D[/size]

I may add other optional textures in the future, but for now this will have to do.



[size=5] MY OTHER MODS[/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34886/?]Lorkhans Vision - Night Sky[/url]
New Version: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48643/?]Lorkhans Vision - Night Sky V2[/url]


Do not distribute this mod without my permission! You can however link this mod wherever you want. If you enjoy this mod then spread the word! :)
author: Doubloonz
